author: Special Correspondent
text:
VIRUDHUNAGAR

Ainthukovil Devasthanam: Panguni pongal, Parasakthi Mariamman shrine, 8.10 p.m.

Kamaraj College of Engineering and Technology: 14{+t}{+h}Graduation Day; S. A. V. Satya Murty, Director, Indira Gandhi Centre for Atomic Research, addresses; A.S.K.A.M. Nagarajan, patron, presides, SPGC Nagar, 11 a.m.

SIVAKASI

Renganayagi Varatharaj College of Engineering: First Graduation Day; R. Jayavel, Director, Centre for Research, Anna University, addresses, Salvarpatti, 9 a.m.
title: Dindigul engagements
